summary: This function retrieves the size of a record.
example-1: module Main in execution;%0A%0Atuple Capital (city : String, country : String);%0A%0A@Start%0Adefun main (args : String[]) : void%0A{%0A    val uk = new Capital(%22London%22, %22United Kingdom%22); %0A%0A    val size = F::len(uk);%0A%0A    F::println(%22Size = %22 .. size);%0A}
